SELECT NULL as id, '' as name_*, '-' as type_*, -10 as `order` UNION SELECT id, name_*, type_*, `order` FROM _l_peritonitis_germs ORDER BY COALESCE(`order`,10)
SELECT NULL as id, '' as name_*, '-' as type_*, -10 as `order` UNION SELECT id, name_*, type_*, `order` FROM _l_peritonitis_germs ORDER BY COALESCE(`order`,10)

list_source:
SELECT id,desc_* FROM ( SELECT NULL as id, "non del Registro (specificare):" AS desc_it, "outside of Registry (specify):" AS desc_en  
UNION SELECT id,centers_description as desc_en,centers_description as desc_it from centers_ ) as alias
desc_en: center following the patient in the specified period
desc_it: centro del paziente nel periodo specificato
